thread.title: Lil Uzi Vert's "Luv Is Rage 2" Will Contain His Debut Rock Song
thread.title_full: Lil Uzi Vert's "Luv Is Rage 2" Will Contain His Debut Rock Song

author: Rose Lilah
title: Lil Uzi Vert's "Luv Is Rage 2" Will Contain His Debut Rock Song
text:
Home > Music > Lil Uzi Vert's "Luv Is Rage 2" Will Contain His Debut Rock Song Lil Uzi Vert's "Luv Is Rage 2" Will Contain His Debut Rock Song 0 0 Posted by Rose Lilah , Mar 4, 2017 at 06:30pm Lil Uzi Vert continues to heavily tease "Luv Is Rage 2." 
Lil Uzi Vert 's teaser campaign for the anticipated follow-up to his breakout project Luv Is Rage has been a lengthy and thorough one. We still don't appear to be any closer to receiving a solid release date, but the Philly native continues to taunt fans on social media that it's definitely "coming soon," going as far as to preface it with the 4-song Luv Is Rage 1.5 mixtape. 
Taking to twiiter for the latest bit of Luv Is Rage 2 promo, Uzi reveals that his rockstar aspirations are coming to reality. "My album is gonna have a debut song from my Rockband," he tweeted with a series of signature emojis. He didn't reveal the details of his rockband beyond that, so we'll have to wait and see.
